name: Flightless (itch) (Yrgo_Game_Creator)
description:
Flightless is a physics based action adventure game where you play as a rolling kiwi bird who gets dropped in the middle of nowhere with nothing but a mystical sword. From a strange elder kiwi, you receive a mission to rescue a lost kiwi bird stuck in a crystal that is guarded by possesed magical mushrooms. You are tasked with battling enemies while also needing to use your magical sword to parkour through the difficult terrain.

Controls

WASD to move

Q and E to rotate sword

Space to jump

Hold space after double jumping to slam

Shift to dash

Right mouse button to jump higher

Mouse to move camera

Scroll to zoom camera

Key 1 to enable & disable sword.

Credits

Graphics
